Real-time message reminders are also supported.The new gesture control feature allows one-handed operation of the watch using wrist movements. For example, flipping your wrist once or twice can trigger customized functions such as answering/rejecting/ignoring incoming calls, skipping to the next/previous music track, performing other operations.     Interactive Design with Interchangeable Bezels and Straps:The CMF Watch Pro 2 features a 1.32" AMOLED display that delivers sharp, vibrant visuals with enhanced resolution (466 x 466), 353 PPI, and a refresh rate of 60Hz. Fitness data can be seamlessly shared with Apple Health, Google Health Connect, and Strava.     Smoothly Watch APP and More Performance: Enjoy seamless connectivity with the CMF Watch app. Manage and control your preferred features with a long battery life of up to 11 days. The watch offers smart functionalities including notifications, quick Android SMS replies, find my phone, camera control, alarms, timers, weather forecasts, music control, and multi-system GPS. Parents can choose from a growing library of kid-safe apps, manage access, set time limits, and more. It's the device that's ready to grow with your child.     ALL THE ESSENTIALS –– JrTrack 4 is equipped with the simple every-day essentials for kids on the go: Alarms & reminders, step counter, activity goals, calculator, timer, stopwatch, and more!

products.description: Ultimate Running Smartwatch: Weighing 44g and just 11.8mm thick, this smartwatch features a titanium alloy bezel, lightweight polymer body, and a comfortable nylon strap. Its responsive crown and button make running control easy, while the 1.45'' HD AMOLED display with Corning Gorilla Glass 3 ensures clear visibility in any environment.     MaxTrack Dual-Band GPS for Ultimate Accuracy: Amazfit's MaxTrack dual-band circular polarization GPS ensures nearly 100% satellite signal reception. This advanced technology reduces interference for highly accurate tracking, even in dense cities with tall buildings or parks with tall trees. The Cheetah Pro uses industry-leading dual-frequency technology, offering double the signal strength and superior tracking performance in complex environments.     Smart Training with Zepp Coach: Cheetah Pro supports Zepp Coach's smart and running plans, offering targeted exercise plans based on user's physical condition for effective, safe workouts. Personalized running schedules cater to individual history and goals, including easy, endurance, and tempo runs with detailed instructions. Real-time guidance ensures efficient goal achievement during training. Besides, Cheetah Pro uses AI to provide better service by simulating real coach interactions, which offers performance insights, trend analysis, and proactive health reminders.     Extended 14 Days Battery Life: This smartwatch boasts a 14-day battery life for everyday use and up to 44 hours in smart GPS mode. In GPS mode, it automatically switches positioning modes based on the environment, utilizing multi-frequency and multi-satellite positioning for accurate tracking.     Precise Route Navigation and Offline Maps: With this sports watch, you'll always know where to run. Download a color map of the area you plan to run from the Zepp app and import it to the watch to get a detailed picture of your surroundings. Pair the map with a matching imported route file and navigate with incredible precision while running.     Bluetooth Phone Calls & Music Storage: Make and receive calls with the watch via a Bluetooth connection to your phone to keep up with personal and professional contacts on the go. Store your running playlist on the watch and listen to music through the built-in speaker or your connected Bluetooth headphones.     Enhanced Running Guidance: Cheetah Pro offers rich running guidance data (like running power and real-time fitness), providing professional coaching references. It's also compatible with various sports peripherals, perfectly complementing your gear for an enhanced sports experience.
